message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but I can't go lower than $12,000. This product is worth a lot to me, and I'm confident it will be worth the same to you. How about we split the difference at $12,750?
I understand your product is valuable to you, but I'm not comfortable going above $12,200. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
